articles.content: Like tennis fans across the globe, Roger Federer too isn't ready for Serena Williams to bid adieu to the sport as he left a priceless message for the tennis icon in a video posted by the ATP shortly … [+2595 chars]

articles.title: Sachin Tendulkar's terrific tweet on Serena Williams wins hearts - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In the third round of US Open 2022, Serena was up against Australia's Ajla Tomljanovic and the Australian won 7-5, 6-7 (4-7), 6-1. After the match, Sachin Tendulkar came up with wonderful tweet on the 23-time Grand Slam champion. | Cricket
articles.content: Serena Williams, winner of 23 Grand Slam singles titles and arguably one of the greatest women tennis players ever, got eliminated from the US Open 2022 in the third round, on Saturday. The legendary… [+2753 chars]
